channel.title: Donating rsgp for help
channel.description: Ok, so im editing sprites in my server's client. Now i got a bunch of sprites, already named and what not, but how do i add a brand new one that it didnt have? For example: My client doesnt have a sprite for hitmarks yet, so how would i know the name to put in, such as "hitMarks 0", or how would i make a name myself, and make the client use it.

item.title: Donating rsgp for help
item.dc:creator: @granshy4productions granshy4productions
item.description:
@granshy4productions wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:2, topic:404189”][quote author=granshy4productions link=topic=501247.msg3667070#msg3667070 date=1310682358]
Ok, so im editing sprites in my server’s client. Now i got a bunch of sprites, already named and what not, but how do i add a brand new one that it didnt have? For example: My client doesnt have a sprite for hitmarks yet, so how would i know the name to put in, such as “hitMarks 0”, or how would i make a name myself, and make the client use it.
[/quote]

Help is for free, You cant buy or sell it here.

You may read some tuts on how to do this…[/quote]
Its not buying or selling, its a donation, and obviously ive allready looked for tuts on this…

Read full topic
